chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 Pro has a problem:
Well, the device only restarts occasionally, I have a 70% battery and suddenly it says I have 1%. Sometimes I plug in the charger and the charging icon doesn't appear. Moreover, it overheats a lot.
Thank you,

When the seller receives the package, they have 3 business days (5 business days for laptops and appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 business days to process a refund if necessary.
The customer meets the following requirements for the return to be processed:
✔ Confirms that the device has not been opened by a third party, exposed to water, or suffered an impact or fall
✔ Confirms they have erased their personal data
✔ Have confirmed they have the return label.
✔ Understands that accessories and the purchase receipt must be included in the return package.
✔ Understands they have 14 days to use the return label.

Remember: once shipped, the seller has 3 business days (5 business days for laptops and appliances) to repair or replace the item and 2 business days to process a refund if necessary.

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for repair or replacement on 06/06/24. The deadline to repair or replace the product is 3 days due to technical problems. Without response with a valid tracking link before 12/06/24 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for your understanding,
Allison from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue, and we do not have sufficient stock for an exchange. We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards, 
KW
